CustomField.description: A clear, detailed description of what this capability does, when it should be used, and what its outcome is. This text is sent directly to the LLM and is critical for helping the AI make correct decisions about which tool to use. The framework will automatically append instructions for confirmation or approval if those options are checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Write a clear description that the AI will use to understand this tool. Explain what it does, when to use it, and what results it provides. Be specific and detailed - this directly impacts the AI's decision-making.
CustomField.label: Description
